revision.text:
{{ZScriptNote}} __NOTOC__
bool, Actor '''TestMobjZ'''([bool quick])
== Usage == Checks if the Actor is currently standing inside of another actor.
=== Parameters === *''quick'' - False by default. If true, stop at the first colliding actor found.
=== Return value === Returns two values: *If false, the Actor collided with something. *The actor it collided with. If ''quick'' is false this is the actor closest to the top that's currently being collided with.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]]
